name: Osprey Duplex 65 Travel Pack - Men's
description: Carry-on-only performance with an innovative design. This trusty 2-in-1 travel pack features two sections: a day pack with padded shoulder straps and hipbelt, and a detachable cargo pack for clothing and toiletries. When you board the plane, unclip the cargo pack and stow it in the overhead bin, then stash the daypack under the seat in front of you for easy access to travel essentials like your laptop (in a dedicated sleeve), headphones, book and snacks. When you land, clip the cargo pack back on and carry the whole thing comfortably to your guesthouse, thanks to the sturdy suspension of the Lightwire frame. The cargo pack's wide opening makes for easy packing, and straps let you compress the load in case you pick up too many souvenirs.Daypack's Lightwire frame supports the load in comfort, whether carried separately or with the cargo bag attached.Comfortable padded shoulder straps and hipbelt provide cushioned comfort.Dedicated laptop sleeve and organizer pockets in the daypack carry in-transit essentials.Duffle-style cargo pack has a wide opening for easy loading and compression straps to cinch everything in tight.
